segments.text: hello , Kate ! How are you doing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: fine . How are your term papers ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: oh , my lord . I haven't really started them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: how could it be ? They are due two weeks later .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know but I was busy with my part-time job the last few days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Kate , you know , I am thinking of getting a part-time job next year because I really need more money and I don't want to ask my parents for any more . But I'm so busy ! How am I going to work and study
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: to be honest with you , Jason , I don't think I'm doing a very good job of balancing my schoolwork with my job . I'm always two steps behind . I've got to get back to the dorm and continue writing tha
segments.speaker: S2
